[center][font size=5]NzbMegaSearch Change Log[/font][/center] [font size=4]2015.06.07[/font] - Initial Release
Container.Overview: NZBmegasearch collects all your (not only) newznab-based accounts to one place. It is your meta-search engine and your SB, CP unique NZB provider.
Container.Description: NZBmegasearch collects all your (not only) newznab-based accounts to one place. It is your meta-search engine and your SB, CP unique NZB provider.[br][br]Map /opt/NZBmegasearch to your unraid appdata share for data persistence
